snippet.title: Nice to NO you - Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Release Date: 1st of October at 9:00am PDT
Launch Price: 7,99$ / 6,59€ (There'll be a 25% launch discount!)
(Expand for more Info)
__________________________________________________

About the Game



Have you ever wanted to make choices that matter and you like cyberpunk? Delete the memories of humans in "Nice to NO you" - a dystopian dialogue game where you decide the fate of individuals and the world.
__________________________________________________
Links

__________________________________________________


Nice to NO you (2020) - Made by QuaranTime Games with the Godot Engine
Contact:
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/quarantimegames/about/
__________________________________________________

https://www.fiverr.com/catkorp
